definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be or become rich (NH in der. spec., and deriv.; Aram. [[עֲתַר]], 9tar; cf. Ar. ga3ara abound with herbage, ga3rah;un abundance, of herbage, goods, etc.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 1 s. [[עָשַׁרְתִּי]] Ho 12:9 I have become rich; Impf. 3 ms. [[יֶעְשַׁר]] Job 15:29 he shall not be rich.—1Ki 22:49 rd. [[עָשָׂה]]

definitions.title: Hiph. 1.
definitions.body: make rich, c. acc. pers.: Pf. 1 s. [[הֶעֱשַׁרְתִּי]] Ge 14:23; 2 fs. [[הֶעֱשַׁרְתְּ]] Ez Eze 27:33 (of personif. Tyre; + [[בְּרׂב הוֹנַיִח]]) ; Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יַעְשְׁרֶנּוּ]] (Ges § 61 g),+ acc. cogn. [[עשֶׁר]]; 2 ms. sf. [[רַבַּת תַּעְשְׁרֶנׇּהּ]] Ps 65:10 thou dost greatly enrich it (the land); obj. om. 3 fs. [[תַּעֲשִׁיר]] Pr 10:22, so Pt. [[מַעֲשִׁיר]] 1Sa 2:7 ´[[י]] maketh rich (opp. [[מוֹרִישׁ]]).

gain riches, abs.: Impf. 3 ms. [[יַעֲשִׁר]] Ps 49:17, [[יַעֲשִׁיר]] Pr 21:7, Da 11:2 (+ acc. cogn. [[עשֶׁר]]) ; 3 fs. [[תַּעֲשִׁיר]] Pr 10:4; 1 s. [[וׇאַעֲשִׁר]] Zec 11:5(Gi Kt ; van d. H. Baer [[וַאעֲשִׁר]]); 3 mpl. [[וַיַּעֲשִׁירוּ]] Je 5:27; Inf. cstr. [[לְהַעֲשִׁיר]] Pr 23:4, Pr 28:20.
